title: Practice Companion
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Welcome, Shioriko-chaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Good afternoon, Honoka-san. I’ll be in your care today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>You can ask me all about our sweets at Homura! You’re looking for sweets to bring out during your tea ceremony practice, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes, that’s right. My teacher asked me to get some.... Do you have any recommendations, Honoka-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I think it’s better if we pick something that fits the season~. These ones are only available during Autumn. They use chestnuts.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Waaah, this one looks so nice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It also tastes great~. Do you want to try some?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeh!? No, that would be....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It’s fine~, it’s fine~. How is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>....It’s really good! I’ll take it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
